## ColorLCH.fromObject() method

Construct a [ColorLCH](./fast-colors.colorlch.md) from a config object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static fromObject(data: {
        l: number;
        c: number;
        h: number;
    }): ColorLCH | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | `{ l: number; c: number; h: number; }` | the config object |
